short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create hunches and connect the dots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Hunch - the ultimate tool for harnessing the power of your intellectual curiosity. With our Chrome extension, you can easily collect, cultivate and capitalize on your personal interests and passions. Whether you're looking to expand your knowledge, improve your critical thinking skills or fuel your creativity, Hunch has everything you need to take your intellectual curiosity to the next level.

With Hunch, you can:

1.Collect dots while browsing: In Hunch, dots are datapoints that spark your curiosity, make you wonder and activate your mind. These are the things you read, watch or see that your mind wants to build on.
1.1 Tag dots and build your frame of reference: When you collect a dot, immediately add some tags so Hunch can start building your frame of reference. Overtime it will make it much easier for Hunch to cultivate your curiosity and help you maximizing the power of your creative and critical thinking.
1.2 Add dots immediately to your hunches: When you collect a dot you can immediately add it to a hunch. A hunch is a feeling or intuition that something is true or likely to happen. It's an idea or opinion you want to validate by connecting the right dots.
1.3 Add comments to your dots: When your mind tells you to collect a dot, you should think why and write it down into the comment section. Again this helps Hunch in cultivating your curiosity.

We believe it's important to trust your instincts and listen to your gut feelings. Hunches can be powerful indicators of what's to come, and can often lead to great success. The key is to pay attention to them and act on them when they feel right. Remember, a hunch is not a guarantee, but it's a sign that your subconscious mind is processing information and trying to guide you in the right direction. Trust yourself and your abilities, and don't be afraid to follow your hunch. It just might lead you to something amazing. At Hunch we believe that in this Information Age, your personal curiosity is not only the biggest key to critical thinking, learning, and creativity, but it's your most valuable financial asset. We are working hard to build features so you can capitalize on it. Try Hunch now and experience the benefits of a curious mind.
